name: Action Horror Romance Super Mystery Sandwich
name_original: Action Horror Romance Super Mystery Sandwich
description:
Live out your dreams of making a sandwich as an action hero, slasher, romantic, superhero, and film noir detective. Then eat the sandwich. You earned it.

*No ingredients were harmed in the making of this game. This recipe calls for 100% organic fictional ingredients.

Written by Raccoon Raconteur

Illustrated by Carly Meyerhardt
